question: Who were some of the notable members of the School of the Wolf, and what happened to Vesemir after the 1260s?
answer: Some notable members of the School of the Wolf included Adon of Carreras, Geralt, Vesemir, Eskel, among others. After the 1260s, Vesemir became the only living member of the 'old' (pre-pogrom) witchers from the school. He spent winters at Kaer Morhen and welcomed some witchers from other schools like Coën, but banned Cats and Vipers. Following his death, Eskel took responsibility for watching over Kaer Morhen.
